name: isaacblocklyworkspace
description: This is a workspace for game The Binding of Isaac Afterbirth+ .Aiming to help players build mods without Lua language.I'm trying to use blockly to do this,as well as nodejs and electron.Sorry for my English,this is only for Chinese players.这是以撒的结合:胎衣+的一个小的开发工具，旨在帮助玩家不使用Lua语言来制作Mod，我使用了blockly图形化编程语言，同时使用nodejs和electron完成软件的编写。英语不好，目前只有中文。
author: frto027
